main event: Three unidentified objects were observed flying in parallel near Yosemite Park, California on August 15, 1964.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be at an altitude of 5-7,000 feet,The sighting lasted for 3-4 seconds,The objects were bright silver in color and made no discernible sound,Witnesses described the objects as small despite being in close proximity,The objects were observed during daylight.
sighted object: three bright silver objects flying in parallel
witness description: Individuals who camped in the area, including a mathematics instructor and a music lecturer.
